definition: the Jade Emperor
jade
emperor

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor deliberately walked into the river, and clutched Cowherd.
sentences.chinese: 玉帝不慌不忙的走入水中，抓住牛郎。

sentences.english: The surrounding celestial region, the Ziwei Star, was the realm of the Celestial Emperor and his family.
sentences.chinese: 天宮的紫薇垣周邊，是玉帝及其家族的領地。

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor made men, fashioning them from clay.
sentences.chinese: 玉帝制造了人，從泥土中塑造他們。

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor heard their prayers and saw the destruction caused by his sons.
sentences.chinese: 玉帝聽到他們的祈禱，明白了這一切乃其子所爲。

sentences.english: You speak to you father that you can help him.
sentences.chinese: 你去找玉帝說你能幫他辦好這件事。

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor was very pleased with the actions of the dragon, and he was added into the zodiac cycle.
sentences.chinese: 龍的行爲讓玉帝非常高興，龍也加入了生肖中。

sentences.english: When the Jade Emperor saw the rain, he was furious.
sentences.chinese: 當玉帝看到雨，他十分震怒。

sentences.english: The celebration of the Jade Emperor’s heavenly birthday has always signaled the winding-down of New Year festivity.
sentences.chinese: 慶賀玉帝誕辰的活動象徵着過年的慶典接近尾聲。

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor’s presence in Chinese culture is 5)pervasive .
sentences.chinese: 中國文化充斥着玉帝的身影。

sentences.english: Another popular legend has it that a race was used to decide the animals to report to the Jade Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 另一個流行的傳說是競賽決定向玉帝報道的動物。

sentences.english: The Heaven God claimed that only when the gold beans were in blossom could the Dragon King return to the heaven palace.
sentences.chinese: 玉帝下令，只有當金豆開花之時才允許龍王返回天庭。

sentences.english: Thunder and killed an innocent widow, Qizou Emperor labeled her mother power.
sentences.chinese: 雷公打死了一個無辜的寡婦，啓奏玉帝把她封爲電母。

sentences.english: Knowing that Hou Yi came from heaven, the people of the clans proclaimed him to be their leader.
sentences.chinese: 得知后羿是玉帝所派，部落的人民推他做首領。

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor sent for God Erh-lang.
sentences.chinese: 玉帝聞言，即差神使前去傳旨。

sentences.english: The Jade Emperor's rule is orderly and without caprice.
sentences.chinese: 玉帝的規則是井然有序，不會反覆無常的。

sentences.english: Great, dad. So can I go down now?
sentences.chinese: 太好了，玉帝。那我現在可以下凡去了？

definition: Jade Emperor
middle of the forehead/imperial court/heaven
Laozi or Lao-tze (c. 500 BC), Chinese philosopher, the founder of Taoism/the sacred book of Daoism, 道德經|道德经 by Laozi
another name for Xi Wangmu 西王母, Queen Mother of the West
Erlangshen, Chinese deity
the pagoda bearing god
tathagata (Buddha's name for himself, having many layers of meaning - Sanskrit: thus gone, having been Brahman, gone to the absolute etc)
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, character with supernatural powers in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]/Son Goku, the main character in Dragon Ball 七龍珠|七龙珠[Qi1 long2 zhu1]
the pagoda bearing god
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
celestial troops and generals (idiom)/fig. superior forces
Gyuumao
(literary) paternal grandmother
another name for 西王母[Xi1 wang2 mu3], Queen Mother of the West
Zhu Bajie, character in Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记, with pig-like characteristics and armed with a muckrake/Pigsy in Arthur Waley's translation
Great Sage the Equal of Heaven, self-proclaimed title of the Monkey King Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1] in the novel Journey to the West 西遊記|西游记[Xi1 you2 Ji4]
lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals
